alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:58PM CDT until July 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RUSK COUNTY... At 558 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Ladysmith, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Hawkins around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tony, Rusk County Airport, Ingram and Glen Flora. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
